actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalty for committing certain crimes with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm.

summary.text: Increases to five years (presently one year) the minimum sentence imposed as an additional penalty upon persons convicted of committing a felony with or while carrying an unlawful firearm under the federal laws. Increases to ten years (now two years) the minimum sentence for a second or subsequent violation. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 924(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalty for committing certain crimes with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm.
